original: @301b / /rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @301b / /rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra k'i la ya m'u la tantra khanda /
analyzed: badzra k'i la ya m'u la tantra khanda /
translated: Vajrakilaya Mula Tantra Khanda

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu /
analyzed: rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu /
translated: The Root Tantra of Vajrakilaya

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Bhagavan Vajrakumara!

original: rdo rje khra bos zhe sdang gcod //
analyzed: rdo rje khra bos zhe sdang gcod //
translated: Vajrakilaya cuts through aggression.

original: mtshon @302a *// chen sngon po cher 'bar ba //
analyzed: mtshon @302a *// chen sngon po cher 'bar ba //
translated: The great blue weapon blazes.

original: nam mkha'i dkyil du thig le shar //🔽srog gi sgo ru shar ba dang // snying gi dkyil du bsgom par bya //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dkyil du thig le shar // srog gi sgo ru shar ba dang // snying gi dkyil du bsgom par bya //
translated: The bindu dawns in the center of space.🔽It arises at the door of life-force

original: snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni //
analyzed: snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni //
translated: and should be meditated on in the center of the heart.🔽The samaya of liberating through compassion

original: bsad cing mnan pa nyid yin te //
analyzed: bsad cing mnan pa nyid yin te //
translated: is to kill and suppress.

original: phur pa'i rdo rje de nyid de //
analyzed: phur pa'i rdo rje de nyid de //
translated: The vajra of the kila

original: rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom //
translated: is meditated on as the vajra of consciousness.

original: aom badzra k'a li k'i la ya sarba bi ghnam bam h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra k'a li k'i la ya sarba bi ghnam bam h'um phat/
translated: Om vajra kali kilaya sarva vighnam vambh hum phat

original: dapti tsakra ha na ha na h'um phat/🔽rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams //🔽'khor ba rdo rjer sgrub par mdzod //
analyzed: dapti tsakra ha na ha na h'um phat/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams // 'khor ba rdo rjer sgrub par mdzod //
translated: Dipti cakra hana hana hum phat🔽Vajrakumara vidyadharas🔽accomplish samsara as the vajra.

original: 'khor ba rdo rje phur pa'i lha //
analyzed: 'khor ba rdo rje phur pa'i lha //
translated: The deity of the vajra of samsara

original: ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod //
analyzed: ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod //
translated: Accomplish the wrathful awareness!

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku //
translated: The awareness body of all buddhas,

original: rdo rje'i de nyid rang bzhin las //
analyzed: rdo rje'i de nyid rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature of the vajra’s suchness,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid //
translated: The essence of the realm of phenomena,

original: 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa //
translated: The blazing wrathful one, unbearable,

original: sku yi gter du bdag bskyed cig /
analyzed: sku yi gter du bdag bskyed cig /
translated: Generate me as a treasure of body!

original: thabs kyi spyod pas sems can don //
analyzed: thabs kyi spyod pas sems can don //
translated: Through the conduct of method, for the sake of sentient beings,

original: byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba //
analyzed: byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba //
translated: Whoever is tamed by love and compassion,

original: sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad //
translated: Complete the activity of the buddhas!

original: dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig /
analyzed: dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig /
translated: Grant me the empowerment and blessing here!

original: aom badzra kro dha h'um ka ra h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha h'um ka ra h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodha hūṃkāra hūṃ

original: gardzdza gardzdza h'um phat/
analyzed: gardzdza gardzdza h'um phat/
translated: Garjja garjja hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra kro dhi d'i pa ya ti h'um/🔽aom badzra su ka ra mu kha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dhi d'i pa ya ti h'um/ aom badzra su ka ra mu kha h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodhi-dīpayati hūṃ🔽Oṃ vajra-sukaramukha hūṃ

original: aom badzra ai shu pa mu khi h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra ai shu pa mu khi h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-iṣu-pamukhi hūṃ🔽This is the great wrathful one Hūṃkāra,🔽The vajra goddess Rāhva,

original: 'di ni khro po chen po h'um mdzad dang // rdo rje lha mo sgra 'byin dang // sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma phag gi mgo can dang / rtsangs pa'i mgo can no //
analyzed: 'di ni khro po chen po h'um mdzad dang // rdo rje lha mo sgra 'byin dang // sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma phag gi mgo can dang / rtsangs pa'i mgo can no //
translated: And the emanated goddesses with the heads of a pig and a lizard.

original: aom badzra kro dha bi dza ya h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha bi dza ya h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodha-vijaya hūṃ

original: ha na ha na h'um @302b phat/
analyzed: ha na ha na h'um @302b phat/
translated: ha na ha na hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra kro dhi l'a sya ki h'um/🔽aom badzra by'a ghra mu kha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dhi l'a sya ki h'um/ aom badzra by'a ghra mu kha h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodhi-lāsya ki hūṃ🔽Oṃ vajra-vyāghra-mukha hūṃ

original: aom badzra gri dhra mu khi h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra gri dhra mu khi h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-gri-dhra-mukhi hūṃ

original: 'di ni khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / rdo rje lha mo sgeg mo dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma stag gi mgo can dang / bya rgod kyi mgo can no //
analyzed: 'di ni khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / rdo rje lha mo sgeg mo dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma stag gi mgo can dang / bya rgod kyi mgo can no //
translated: This is the great wrathful one Viyaya, the vajra goddess Lāsya, and the emanated goddesses, the piśācīs with the heads of a tiger and a vulture.

original: aom badzra kro dha n'i la danda h'um da ha da ha h'um phat/🔽aom badzra kro dhi t'i t'a ru h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha n'i la danda h'um da ha da ha h'um phat/ aom badzra kro dhi t'i t'a ru h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodha-nīla-danda hūṃ da ha da ha hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ vajra-krodhi-tīkṣṇa hūṃ🔽Oṃ vajra-cāmara-mukha hūṃ

original: aom badzra tsa ma ra mu kha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra tsa ma ra mu kha h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-tāṇḍava-mukhi hūṃ

original: aom badzra t'a na mu khi h'um; 'di ni khro bo dbyug sngon 'chang ba dang / lha mo rdo rje sder mo dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma g-yag mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can no //
analyzed: aom badzra t'a na mu khi h'um; 'di ni khro bo dbyug sngon 'chang ba dang / lha mo rdo rje sder mo dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma g-yag mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can no //
translated: This is the wrathful one holding a blue staff, the goddess Vajra-tīkṣṇa, and the emanated goddesses, the piśācīs with the heads of a gayal and a crow.🔽Oṃ vajra-krodha-yamāntaka hūṃ

original: aom badzra kro dha ya m'anta ka h'um; pa tsa pa tsa h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha ya m'anta ka h'um; pa tsa pa tsa h'um phat/
translated: paca paca hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra kro dhi sma sh'a na ba ti h'um/🔽aom badzra ha ri na mu khi h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dhi sma sh'a na ba ti h'um/ aom badzra ha ri na mu khi h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodha-Yamāntaka-bhattāraka hūṃ🔽Oṃ vajra-hariṇamukhī hūṃ

original: aom badzra a'u lu ka mu khi h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra a'u lu ka mu khi h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-ulūkāmukhī hūṃ

original: 'di ni khro bo gshin rje mthar byed dang / rdo rje lha mo dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma ri dvags kyi mgo can dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can no //🔽aom badzra kro dha a'arya aa tsa la h'um bandha bandha h'um phat/
analyzed: 'di ni khro bo gshin rje mthar byed dang / rdo rje lha mo dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma ri dvags kyi mgo can dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can no // aom badzra kro dha a'arya aa tsa la h'um bandha bandha h'um phat/
translated: This is Krodha Yamāntaka, the destroyer, Vajra Goddess of the charnel ground, and the emanated goddesses, the piśācīs with the heads of a deer and an owl.🔽Oṃ vajra-krodha-Acala hūṃ bandha bandha hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra kro dhi mu ha la h'um/🔽aom badzra tya ki mu kha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dhi mu ha la h'um/ aom badzra tya ki mu kha h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodha-Mahābhairava hūṃ🔽Oṃ vajra-vyāghrī-mukhī hūṃ

original: aom badzra pre te mu khi h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra pre te mu khi h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-pretāmukhī hūṃ

original: 'di ni khro bo mi g-yo mgon po dang / rdo rje lha mo gtun khung ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma gzig gi mgo can dang / khva'i mgo can no //🔽aom badzra kro dha ha ya gr'i ba h'um hu lu hu lu h'um phat/
analyzed: 'di ni khro bo mi g-yo mgon po dang / rdo rje lha mo gtun khung ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma gzig gi mgo can dang / khva'i mgo can no // aom badzra kro dha ha ya gr'i ba h'um hu lu hu lu h'um phat/
translated: This is Krodha Acala, the immovable one, Vajra Goddess of the mortar, and the emanated goddesses, the piśācīs with the heads of a tiger and a jackal.🔽Oṃ vajra-krodha-Hayagrīva hūṃ hulu hulu hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra kro dhi dza ya ti h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dhi dza ya ti h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodha-Jayā hūṃ

original: aom badzra bi tra la mu kha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra bi tra la mu kha h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-vītra-mukha hūṃ.

original: aom badzra pakshi ta mu khi h'um/🔽'di ni khro bo rta @303a *//
analyzed: aom badzra pakshi ta mu khi h'um/ 'di ni khro bo rta @303a *//
translated: Oṃ vajra-pakṣi-mukhi hūṃ.

original: mgrin dang / rdo rje lha mo gtum mo dang / sgrul pa'i lha mo phra men ma byi la'i mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgo can no //
analyzed: mgrin dang / rdo rje lha mo gtum mo dang / sgrul pa'i lha mo phra men ma byi la'i mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgo can no //
translated: This is the wrathful Hayagrīva, the vajra goddess Caṇḍī, the accomplished goddess with the face of a cat, and the one with the face of a hoopoe.🔽Oṃ vajra-krodha-aparājita hūṃ.

original: aom badzra kro dha aa pa r'a dzi ta h'um; tishtha tishtha h'um phat/🔽aom badzra kro dhi sa bya ti h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha aa pa r'a dzi ta h'um; tishtha tishtha h'um phat/ aom badzra kro dhi sa bya ti h'um/
translated: Tiṣṭha tiṣṭha hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra-krodhi-śyāmā hūṃ.

original: aom badzra srim ga la mu kha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra srim ga la mu kha h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-śṛṅkhalā-mukha hūṃ.

original: aom badzra panytsar na mu khi h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra panytsar na mu khi h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-pañjara-mukhi hūṃ.

original: 'di ni khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rdo rje lha mo mda' snyems ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma spyang khu'i mgo can dang / khra'i mgo can no //
analyzed: 'di ni khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rdo rje lha mo mda' snyems ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma spyang khu'i mgo can dang / khra'i mgo can no //
translated: This is the wrathful Aparājita, the vajra goddess Aṅkuśī, the emanated goddess with the face of a jackal, and the one with the face of a vulture.

original: aom badzra kro dha aa mi ta /
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha aa mi ta /
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodha-amitā.🔽Kuṇḍali hūṃ.

original: kunda li h'um/ tshinda tshinda h'um phat/🔽aom badzra kra dhi sa bya mi ti h'um/
analyzed: kunda li h'um/ tshinda tshinda h'um phat/ aom badzra kra dhi sa bya mi ti h'um/
translated: Chedā-chedā hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra-krodhi-śyāma hūṃ.

original: aom badzra sing ha mu kha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra sing ha mu kha h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra-siṃha-mukha hūṃ.

original: aom badzra ti ti la mu khi h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra ti ti la mu khi h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra tiṭiṭa mukhī hūṃ.

original: 'di ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / rdo rje lha mo sgra mdzad ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma seng ge'i mgo can dang / pha wang gi mgo can no //
analyzed: 'di ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / rdo rje lha mo sgra mdzad ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma seng ge'i mgo can dang / pha wang gi mgo can no //
translated: This is the wrathful Amṛtakuṇḍali, the vajra goddess Bhṛkuṭī, and the emanated goddesses, the lion-faced and the bat-faced piśācīs.

original: aom badzra kro dha tree lo kya bi dza ya h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha tree lo kya bi dza ya h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra krodha trailokya vijaya hūṃ.

original: binda binda h'um phat/
analyzed: binda binda h'um phat/
translated: Vindha vindha hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra kro dha m'a ra ya h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha m'a ra ya h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra krodha māraya hūṃ.

original: aom badzra rakshi sa mu kha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra rakshi sa mu kha h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra rakṣa samukha hūṃ.

original: aom badzra ku la mu khi h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra ku la mu khi h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra kuṭa mukhī hūṃ.

original: 'di ni khro bo 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / rdo rje lha mo gsod byed ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma dred kyi mgo can dang / sre mo'i mgo can no //
analyzed: 'di ni khro bo 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / rdo rje lha mo gsod byed ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma dred kyi mgo can dang / sre mo'i mgo can no //
translated: This is the wrathful Trailokyavijaya, the vajra goddess Caṇḍī, and the emanated goddesses, the hyena-faced and the cat-faced piśācīs.

original: aom badzra kro dha mah'a ba la h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha mah'a ba la h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra krodha mahābala hūṃ.

original: spo ta spo ta h'um phat/
analyzed: spo ta spo ta h'um phat/
translated: Sphota sphota hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra kro dhi munte mam h'um/🔽aom badzra raksha sa mu kha h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra kro dhi munte mam h'um/ aom badzra raksha sa mu kha h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra krodhi muṇḍī mam hūṃ.🔽Oṃ vajra rakṣa samukha hūṃ.

original: aom badzra ka shi ka mu khi h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra ka shi ka mu khi h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra kaśika mukhī hūṃ.

original: 'di ni @303b khro bo stobs po che dang / rdo rje lha mo rig byed ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma dom gyi mgo can dang // byi ba'i mgo can no //
analyzed: 'di ni @303b khro bo stobs po che dang / rdo rje lha mo rig byed ma dang / sprul pa'i lha mo phra men ma dom gyi mgo can dang // byi ba'i mgo can no //
translated: This is the wrathful Mahābala, the vajra goddess Vidyā, and the emanated goddesses with the heads of a bear and a rat.

original: aom badzra yaksha sa da h'um dza /🔽aom badzra bhee ra be h'um h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra yaksha sa da h'um dza / aom badzra bhee ra be h'um h'um/
translated: Oṃ vajra yakṣa sadhūṃ ja🔽Oṃ vajra bhairva hūṃ hūṃ

original: aom badzra aa mri ta h'um bam/
analyzed: aom badzra aa mri ta h'um bam/
translated: Oṃ vajra amṛta hūṃ vaṃ

original: aom badzra ma ra ni h'um ho: 'di ni shar du pu shud kyi mgo can dang / lhor bya rog gi mgo can /
analyzed: aom badzra ma ra ni h'um ho: 'di ni shar du pu shud kyi mgo can dang / lhor bya rog gi mgo can /
translated: Oṃ vajra māraṇi hūṃ hoḥ. This is the one with the head of a puśśuda in the east, the one with the head of a crow in the south,

original: nub tu srin bya'i mgo can /
analyzed: nub tu srin bya'i mgo can /
translated: the one with the head of a vampire in the west,

original: byang du khra'i mgo can no //
analyzed: byang du khra'i mgo can no //
translated: and the one with the head of a hawk in the north.

original: 'khor ba phur bu sgrub don du //
analyzed: 'khor ba phur bu sgrub don du //
translated: In order to accomplish the kīla of saṃsāra,

original: dbang dang byin rlabs zhu ba'i phyir //
analyzed: dbang dang byin rlabs zhu ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to request empowerment and blessings,

original: ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol //
translated: the wrathful ones of pristine consciousness are requested to come.

original: ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang //
analyzed: ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang //
translated: Having come, the wrathful ones of pristine consciousness,🔽please reveal the signs and indications

original: rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // phur pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol //🔽dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab //
analyzed: rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // phur pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol // dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab //
translated: and grant the spiritual powers of the kīla.🔽The time of the great pledge has come.

original: sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab //
analyzed: sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab //
translated: The time of the great emanations has come.

original: pho nya chen po'i dus la bab //🔽bdag nyid chen po'i dus la bab //
analyzed: pho nya chen po'i dus la bab // bdag nyid chen po'i dus la bab //
translated: The time has come for the great messenger.🔽The time has come for the great being.

original: sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab //
analyzed: sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab //
translated: The time has come for the great earth lord.

original: khyi yi gdong can dus la bab //
analyzed: khyi yi gdong can dus la bab //
translated: The time has come for the one with the face of a dog.

original: bsgral bar bya ba'i dus la bab //
analyzed: bsgral bar bya ba'i dus la bab //
translated: The time has come to liberate.

original: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas //
analyzed: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas //
translated: Having generated the mind of enlightenment,

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas sras bzhin du //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas sras bzhin du //
translated: like the children of the buddhas of the three times,

original: rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni //🔽gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs //
analyzed: rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni // gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs //
translated: for us vidyādharas🔽the harmful, malicious enemies and obstructors,

original: bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams //
analyzed: bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams //
translated: demons and obstacles,

original: khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
translated: through the blessing of the great wrathful one,

original: yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas //
analyzed: yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas //
translated: in an instant they are summoned

original: mngon spyod tshul gyis bsgral ba dang // lus ngag phye mar mdzad nas kyang //
analyzed: mngon spyod tshul gyis bsgral ba dang // lus ngag phye mar mdzad nas kyang //
translated: and liberated through the method of destroying body and speech,

original: sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod //
analyzed: sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod //
translated: may they experience suffering.

original: aom lam h'um lam stam bha nam/
analyzed: aom lam h'um lam stam bha nam/
translated: oṃ laṃ hūṃ laṃ stabs nam

original: @304a *// mo hi gh'a ta ya /
analyzed: @304a *// mo hi gh'a ta ya /
translated: mohi ghaṭaya

original: bha ga b'an /
analyzed: bha ga b'an /
translated: bhagavān

original: hr'i:sht'i:bi kri ta badzra h'um k'a ra h'um/
analyzed: hr'i:sht'i:bi kri ta badzra h'um k'a ra h'um/
translated: hrīḥ śrīḥ vikṛta vajra hūṃ kāra hūṃ

original: badzra k'i li ki la ya dza:h'um bam ho:sarba bighnan badzra k'i li k'i la ya h'um phat/🔽bgegs byed pa yi bdud rnams dang // sdug bsngal sems la mnyam sbyor ba //🔽che ge mo zhes bya ba'i bdud //🔽zungs shig rdungs shig rnam par chings //
analyzed: badzra k'i li ki la ya dza:h'um bam ho:sarba bighnan badzra k'i li k'i la ya h'um phat/ bgegs byed pa yi bdud rnams dang // sdug bsngal sems la mnyam sbyor ba // che ge mo zhes bya ba'i bdud // zungs shig rdungs shig rnam par chings //
translated: vajra kilikīlaya jaḥ hūṃ baṃ hoḥ / sarva vighanāṃ vajra kilikīlaya hūṃ phaṭ🔽The māras who create obstacles🔽and who are equal-minded in their suffering🔽are the māras called by such-and-such names.🔽Seize them! Strike them! Bind them!🔽

original: gtogs shig grogs dang dbye bar gyis //🔽ring nas khug la smra ru chug /🔽phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis //🔽bdag gi dbang du byas gyur nas //🔽bsgo ba'i bka' nyan gus par gyis //🔽h'um par pidy'a tstshinda tstshinda h'um phat/🔽bhinda bhinda h'um phat/🔽gri hna gri hna h'um phat/🔽bhandha bhandha h'um phat/🔽tr'a sha ya tr'a sha ya h'um phat/🔽ha sa ya ra /🔽ha sa ya ra /🔽hr'i:danda h'um phat/ sh'i ghrim a'a na ya h'um phat/🔽dzva l'a pa ya dzva la pa ya h'um phat/
analyzed: gtogs shig grogs dang dbye bar gyis //🔽ring nas khug la smra ru chug /🔽phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis //🔽bdag gi dbang du byas gyur nas //🔽bsgo ba'i bka' nyan gus par gyis //🔽h'um par pidy'a tstshinda tstshinda h'um phat/🔽bhinda bhinda h'um phat/🔽gri hna gri hna h'um phat/🔽bhandha bhandha h'um phat/🔽tr'a sha ya tr'a sha ya h'um phat/🔽ha sa ya ra /🔽ha sa ya ra /🔽hr'i:danda h'um phat/ sh'i ghrim a'a na ya h'um phat/🔽dzva l'a pa ya dzva la pa ya h'um phat/

original: a'a be she ya a'a be sha ya h'um phat/
analyzed: a'a be she ya a'a be sha ya h'um phat/
translated: Avashya avashya hum phat.

original: bindha ya bindha ya h'um phat/
analyzed: bindha ya bindha ya h'um phat/
translated: Vindhya vindhya hum phat.

original: pho nya bran dang mngag pa'i tshogs //
analyzed: pho nya bran dang mngag pa'i tshogs //
translated: The assembly of messengers, servants, and emissaries,

original: khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab //
analyzed: khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab //
translated: Your sacred bonds are now timely.🔽Just as you are certain to be wrathful,

original: mngon spyod ji ltar nges pa dang // mngon spyod byin rlabs de bzhin mdzod //🔽ha na ha na badzra /
analyzed: mngon spyod ji ltar nges pa dang // mngon spyod byin rlabs de bzhin mdzod // ha na ha na badzra /
translated: Bless us in the same way for wrathful activity.🔽Hana hana vajra.

original: da ha da ha badzra /
analyzed: da ha da ha badzra /
translated: Dhaha dhaha vajra.

original: pa tsa pa tsa badzra /
analyzed: pa tsa pa tsa badzra /
translated: Pacha pacha vajra.

original: ma th'a ma th'a badzra /🔽dzva la dzva la badzra /
analyzed: ma th'a ma th'a badzra / dzva la dzva la badzra /
translated: Matha matha vajra.🔽Jvala jvala vajra.

original: su ru su ru badzra /
analyzed: su ru su ru badzra /
translated: Suru suru vajra.

original: mu ru mu ru badzra /
analyzed: mu ru mu ru badzra /
translated: Mururu vajra.

original: ka ta ka ta ye dza ye /
analyzed: ka ta ka ta ye dza ye /
translated: Kata kata ye jaya ye.

original: bi dza ye /
analyzed: bi dza ye /
translated: Vijaya ye.

original: aa dzi te /
analyzed: aa dzi te /
translated: Ajita ye.

original: aa pa r'a dzi te /
analyzed: aa pa r'a dzi te /
translated: Aparajita ye.

original: m'a ra se n+y'a pra marda ni h'um phat/
analyzed: m'a ra se n+y'a pra marda ni h'um phat/
translated: Mara senya pramaradani hum phat.

original: rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' lung gis //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' lung gis //
translated: By the secret vajra command,

original: sdig can gang @304b zhig 'da' byed pa //
analyzed: sdig can gang @304b zhig 'da' byed pa //
translated: Whoever transgresses the wicked

original: stobs chen khro bo chen po yis //
analyzed: stobs chen khro bo chen po yis //
translated: With the great wrathful one of great power,

original: mgo bo tshal pa brgya ru gyis //
analyzed: mgo bo tshal pa brgya ru gyis //
translated: Smash their head into a hundred pieces.

original: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren rnams //
analyzed: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren rnams //
translated: Listen here, you obstructing ones and misleaders,

original: nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed //
analyzed: nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed //
translated: Do not transgress my command.

original: h'um ma ma pa sh'am ku ru /
analyzed: h'um ma ma pa sh'am ku ru /
translated: Hum mama pasham kuru.

original: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
analyzed: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
translated: All those who are malicious and have an attitude of hostility,

original: song zhig lha min lha yang rung //
analyzed: song zhig lha min lha yang rung //
translated: Go away, whether you are demigods or gods.

original: nga la bar chad byed pa'i bdud //
analyzed: nga la bar chad byed pa'i bdud //
translated: The demons who create obstacles for me,

original: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par mdzod //
analyzed: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par mdzod //
translated: Make them powerless and devoid of magical power.

original: sarba a'a na ya h'um phat/
analyzed: sarba a'a na ya h'um phat/
translated: Sarva anaya hum phat.

original: ta tha' ya h'um phat/
analyzed: ta tha' ya h'um phat/
translated: Tathaya hum phat.

original: rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun //
analyzed: rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun //
translated: Strike with the blazing vajra weapon.

original: bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams //
analyzed: bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams //
translated: All you evil ones who transgress the command,

original: rdo rje me yis snying bsregs nas //
analyzed: rdo rje me yis snying bsregs nas //
translated: Having burned your hearts with the vajra fire,

original: lus sems rdul bzhin brlag par mdzod //
analyzed: lus sems rdul bzhin brlag par mdzod //
translated: Reduce your bodies and minds to dust.

original: khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du //
analyzed: khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du //
translated: In the mortar of the blazing wrathful woman,

original: rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas //
analyzed: rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas //
translated: Having been pounded with the vajra hammer,

original: lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya //
analyzed: lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya //
translated: Even the gods should be liberated.

original: kha tam kha tam kha tam/
analyzed: kha tam kha tam kha tam/
translated: Khatam khatam khatam.

original: h'um h'um h'um/ phat phat phat/🔽badzra yaksha kro dha kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
analyzed: h'um h'um h'um/ phat phat phat/ badzra yaksha kro dha kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
translated: Hum hum hum. Phat phat phat.

original: ha ha / h'um h'um/
analyzed: ha ha / h'um h'um/
translated: Vajra yaksha krodha khakhar marma khara khara ha ha hum hum phat phat.

original: phat phat/ chos nyid kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: phat phat/ chos nyid kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The truth of dharmata.

original: gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so //
translated: Consecrated by the blessing of secret mantra.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis mthur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis mthur 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be so by the power of the Buddha's blessing.

original: brang pa de kho na nyid do //🔽k'i la ya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so //🔽k'i la ya lan bco brgyad bzlas nas sting dkar nag gi mtshams su'o //🔽h'um h'um h'um/ ho ho ho //🔽phat phat phat/ 'di brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: brang pa de kho na nyid do // k'i la ya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so // k'i la ya lan bco brgyad bzlas nas sting dkar nag gi mtshams su'o // h'um h'um h'um/ ho ho ho // phat phat phat/ 'di brjod par bya'o //
translated: The reality of the mantra is:

original: rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu slob dpon padma 'byung gnas dngos kyi rgya dpe dang mthun par dpal ldan sa skya pandi tas g-yas ru'i @305a *//🔽sa'i cha shangs kyi sreg zhing du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
